QuestData.Title: Camp Lastwind
QuestData.Description:
A vulpera caravan recently set up camp not far from here.
Dis could be a good opportunity to establish new trade partners with de tribe.
De desert is a dangerous place, $n. Go see if dey need any assistance. I'm sure dey could use experienced hands like yours.
In exchange, perhaps dey'd be willing to offer de tribe a discount on goods and services.
